title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point - dark, black, bloody, dirty, filthy, dusty; pierced, punctured, swollen, swelling

Note: While a brief (even a single word) answer may be acceptable, it must clearly reflect comprehension of lines 5-6 and not merely general recall of other passages in the epic.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Note: While a brief (even a single word) answer may be acceptable, it must clearly reflect comprehension of lines 5-6 and not merely general recall of other passages in the epic.

Student response earns one of the available points.

Note: While a brief (even a single word) answer may be acceptable, it must clearly reflect comprehension of lines 5-6 and not merely general recall of other passages in the epic.
